verses.name: Jeremiah 44:3
verses.text: Because of their wickedness which they have committed to provoke me to anger, in that they went to burn incense, and to serve other gods, whom they knew not, neither they, ye, nor your fathers.

verses.name: Jeremiah 44:4
verses.text: Howbeit I sent unto you all my servants the prophets, rising early and sending them, saying, Oh, do not this abominable thing that I hate.

verses.name: Jeremiah 44:5
verses.text: But they hearkened not, nor inclined their ear to turn from their wickedness, to burn no incense unto other gods.
